Direzione o partecipazione a comitati ed.content: Member of the International Advisory Board of the Academic Journal "Mediterranean Politics"

Organizzazione o partecipazione come rel.content: Speaker at the Academic Association for Contemporary European Studies (UACES) Annual Conference, Edinburgh, Topic: Democracy Assistance in the Middle East and North Africa: A Comparison of US and EU Policies.
Speaker at the International Studies Association (ISA) Annual Convention, New York, Topic: 2009: Ancient Athens’ Democracy Promotion: Democratic Realism or Democratic Mission?

Speaker at the Italian Political Science Association (SISP) Annual Convention, University of Palermo, Topic: Democratic Realism or Democratic Mission? The EU's Democracy Promotion in its Mediterranean Neighborhood

Organization of a Conference on the issues of the new constitution and democracy in Turkey, the Eurozone crisis and its impact on Turkey, and Turkey's and the EU's foreign policy in the common neighbourhood at the German Marshall Fund in Brussels.

Organization and Speaker at a Conference on the EU anchor and the Turkish reform process, Turkish foreign policy and the Arab Spring, as well as Turkey and post-crisis Europe at the Mercator Foundation in Berlin
Organization of a conference on the issues of Turkey and the future of the Eurozone, as well as institutional and political implications at the Istanbul Policy Center
Organization of a Conference on Turkish-European energy relations and Turkey as a regional energy hub at the European Council of Foreign Relations (ECFR) in London
Organization of a Conference on the issues of migration, citizenship and civil society, as well as the electoral year in Turkey at the Mercator Foundation Berlin .
Organization of a Conference on EU-Turkey relations in the wake of the Ukraine crisis at the College of Europe in Warsaw
Organization of a Conference on Challenges to Democratic Consolidation in Turkey at the German Marshall Fund in Brussels
Organization of and Speaker at a Conference on Resetting Mediterranean Relations, LUISS University, Rome.
Organization of a Conference on "TTIP and Third States. The Case of Turkey" at Notre Europe, Paris
Organization of a conference on "Turkey, the Kurds and a New Region" in cooperation with the Al-Sharq Forum at the Istituto Affari Internazionali in Rome
Organization of a conference on Post-Election Turkey and the Kurdish Peace Process at the Mercator Stiftung in Berlin
Speaker at a Conference on EU Foreign Policy in the Mediterranean, Centre for Strategic Studies, University of Jordan, Topic: EU youth policy in the Mediterranean region.
Speaker at a Conference on Political Islam, University of Trento, Topic: The United States and Political Islam.
Speaker and Discussant at the Italian Political Science Association (SISP) Annual Convention, University of Milan, Topics: EU youth policy in the Mediterranean region / The New EU Global Strategy
Speaker at the academic conference "Mediterranean Perspectives", at LUISS University, Topic: "The Israeli-Palestinian Conflict after the Arab Uprisings"

Responsabilita' di studi e ricerche scie.content: Ph.D. Research Scholarship, Friedrich Ebert Foundation & German Academic Foreign Exchange Service (DAAD)
Working Paper commissioned by the European Forum at the Hebrew University on "Normative Power Europe? The EU’s Foreign Policy of Democracy Promotion in the Palestinian Authority"
Individual Postdoc Research Scholarship, Gerda Henkel Special Programme on Islam, the Modern Nation State and Transnational Movements
Working Paper commissioned by EuroMeSCo on "The EU and Conflict Resolution in the Mediterranean Neighbourhood. Tackling New Realities through Old Means?"
Working Paper commissioned by the EuroMed Rights Group on EU policies towards Israel

Conseguimento di premi e riconoscimenti.content: Yad Ora Award for Dissertation Research, Hebrew University of Jerusalem

Partecipazione al collegio dei docenti o.content: Academic mentor at the Istituto Affari Internazionali for three doctoral candidates in the framework of GEM STONES - an integrated research and PhD fellowship programme funded through the European Commission’s Marie Sklodowska-Curie Action

Formale attribuzione di incarichi di ins.content: Adjunct Professor, American University of Rome, Spring Semester Course on "History of the Modern Middle East"

Direzione o partecipazione alle attivit\.content: Participation in the Einstein Research Group on Human Rights of the Hebrew University of Jerusalem and the Freie Universität Berlin

Coordinator of Global Turkey in Europe - a research project of the Istituto Affari Internazionali, the Istanbul Policy Center, and the Mercator Foundation on EU-Turkey relations which has led to the publication of three collective volumes and more than 60 papers, has developed a network of 60 academics and analysts, and has conveyed a series of conferences in European capitals.
Participation in the Research Project "Cooperation in the Mediterranean and the Middle East", funded by the German Marshall Fund of the United States

Participation in NewMed Research Network, which is interested in the complex social, political, cultural and security-related dynamics that are unfolding in the Mediterranean region. The network is developed by IAI, in cooperation with the OSCE Secretariat in Vienna, the Compagnia di San Paolo of Turin, the Italian Ministry of Foreign Affairs and International Cooperation, and the German Marshall Fund (GMF) of the United States.

Responsabilita' scientifica per progetti.content: Principal Investigator / Scientific Coordinator of the Horizon 2020 Project MEDRESET. MEDRESET is a consortium of 12 research and academic institutions focusing on different disciplines from the Mediterranean region to develop alternative visions for a new Mediterranean partnership and corresponding EU policies. It aims at designing an inclusive, flexible, and responsive future role for the EU in the region based on the multiple perspectives of local and bottom-up actors. MEDRESET is a project funded under the European Commission’s Horizon 2020 Programme for Research and Innovation with a total budget of 2,497 million Euros. It will run for three years, starting in April 2016.
